name: shopping-for-algolia-personalized
description: Read-only access to your shopping personalization data from the Shopping for Algolia app
long_description: This extension provides read-only access to your shopping personalization profile created by the Shopping for Algolia Personalized desktop app. View your category preferences, price ranges, and shopping patterns to help AI assistants understand your shopping preferences.

tools.name: get_personalization_summary
tools.description: Get a comprehensive summary of your shopping personalization data including categories, styles, and behavior

tools.name: get_user_preferences
tools.description: Get your shopping preferences in a structured format including category interests and price ranges
